actions.title: Wire x402 HTTP payment into headless-markets before nullpath gains traction
actions.reason: Scout report exec #73 confirms x402 becoming agent-to-agent payment standard on Base. Issue NOT opened for 13+ consecutive cycles. Every cycle without this compounds risk vs nullpath.com (live at $0, already using x402). AgentScan ERC-8004 launched with 17,887 agents on Base - window to differentiate is closing.

market_signals.key_finding: AgentScan launched on Base as ERC-8004 AI agent discovery layer. Base dominates with 17,887 agent registrations vs Ethereum's 1,967. Strong network effects emerging. x402 HTTP payment standard gaining institutional tracking. Base ecosystem shows 1.23M addresses, 85% new user conversion, $100M+ ETH transaction value.
